name: @heiwa4126/hello4
description: TypeScript hello world library with dual ES modules/CommonJS support. Features GitHub Actions trusted publishing to npmjs with Sigstore attestation.

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run rename-cjs && npm run set-permissions && npm run copy-package-json
scripts.copy-package-json: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const distPkg = { name: pkg.name, version: pkg.version, description: pkg.description, type: 'module', main: './cjs/hello.cjs', module: './esm/hello.js', types: './esm/hello.d.ts', exports: { '.': { types: './esm/hello.d.ts', import: './esm/hello.js', require: './cjs/hello.cjs' } }, bin: { 'heiwa4126-hello4': './esm/main.js' }, author: pkg.author, license: pkg.license }; require('fs').writeFileSync('./dist/package.json', JSON.stringify(distPkg, null, 2));"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test:run && npm run smoke-test
scripts.format:full: npm pkg fix && biome format --write . && dprint fmt && textlint --fix "**/*.md"

author: heiwa4126 <heiwa4126@gmail.com>
